testMessages.text: This is a simple single line message.
testMessages.translation: Huu ni ujumbe rahisi wa laini moja.

testMessages.translation: Hii ni ujumbe mrefu na comma, kusimamishwa kamili na herufi chache za nasibu. --&

testMessages.translation: Ujumbe huu una tepe ya <html>. Hii inapaswa kuonyeshwa kama maandishi wazi.
